name: Simple Web Design Method
description:
Hi, everyone!


Sometimes we do not know where take inspiration or just have not much time and in such times I use this simle method for start process:


1) —Åhoise any web-site which you realy like, make full screenshot;


2) make prototype with same structure, colors and typography;


3) find photos with same color palet and insert, add texts... Your first concept variant is ready! 


This is an example of how a website for the sale of dishes turned out from a website selling chairs). Enjoy!


Press üíù if you like :)
